article.title: The User Interface for Interactive Bibliographic Searching:An Analysis of the Attitudes of Nineteen Information Scientists
article.author: Martin, Thomas H.Carlisle, JamesTreu, Siegfried
article.text: Since little substantiated evidence exists concerning the features that should of should not be included in the man-machine interface of interactive bibliographic search and retrieval (IBSR) systems, an informal survey tapping the opinions of scientists active in this research area was conducted.. An analysis of the responses showed a significant level of agreement concerning interface features..
